description: Enhance Python MCP detection system by adding TypeScript's 24-category classification, confidence scoring, ambiguity detection, and improved element search with fuzzy matching. Aligns Python implementation with TypeScript reference blueprint for better resource sheet generation.

key_gaps: No ambiguity detection with alternate categories

priority_improvements: 1. Add classification system from TypeScript (24 categories + priority-based)
2. Implement confidence scoring with characteristic breakdown
3. Enhance element search (fuzzy, case-insensitive, partial, ID-based)
4. Add ambiguity detection and alternate category suggestions
5. Sync characteristic flags between TS and Python (17 vs 20+)

key_strengths.typescript: Well-defined categorization, ambiguity detection, confidence scoring, human-readable names
key_strengths.python: Graph query integration (GRAPH-001), graceful fallbacks, more characteristic flags, async analysis
